title: Support not helping me when it is a big deal
body: I put in a support ticket on Tuesday 10/11/2016 at 8:56 PM (EDT) about credit/debit fraud and not a single riot support staff employee has gotten to my ticket. It is still pending. I added information to it on Thursday 10:28 AM (EDT) about more information regarding the issue and it is now Sunday 1:35 (EDT) and no one has gotten to my ticket at all. I am a bit deterred that the Riot Support Staff may have just glared over this ticket and ignored it, although it is a serious issue that happened to me and I need for it to be fixed immediately. Any riot employee that can read this post please have someone look into this ASAP. I am concerned for what happened and why it happened. I'm willing to speak to a staff member however possible.

replies.body: We have no reason to ignore a ticket, and we want to help!  Looking into this, I confirmed your ticket was successfully received and was escalated to be reviewed by our Billing team.  I see you have another ticket open; however, it will likely be closed to prevent delay or confusion in responding to your issue.  It may be a bit depending on the size of the queue, but a specialist will be fully reviewing this and helping you out with any reparations possible.  In the meantime, I recommend using our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to make sure your information in and out of league are secure and inaccessible to unauthorized parties.  You'll be in good hands, just hang tight!

I was wondering if there is a possible way for me to get my full purchase history for my account somehow?
Legally, we can provide these details through the [privacy ](http://privacy.riotgames.com)page.  Bear in mind that there is a small fee for legal fees and processing.  Hope that helps!
